#1# hiribalaṁ ottappabalaṁ viriyabalaṁ paññābalaṁ. Katamañca bhikkhave
#2# saddhābalaṁ idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako saddho hoti saddahati

#6# saddhābalaṁ. Katamañca bhikkhave hiribalaṁ idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako
#7# hirimā hoti hiriyati kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena

#11# manoduccaritena ottappati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā

#16# Katamañca bhikkhave paññābalaṁ idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako paññavā

#0# Hoti duppañño hoti imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi dhammehi
#1# samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye. ^a^PA.III,4^ea^ Pañcahi bhikkhave
#2# dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge katamehi
#3# pañcahi idha bhikkhave bhikkhu saddho hoti hirimā hoti
#4# ottappī hoti āraddhaviriyo hoti paññavā hoti imehi
#5# kho bhikkhave pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṁ nikkhitto
#6# evaṁ saggeti.
#7# [5] Yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā sikkhaṁ
#8# paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati tassa diṭṭheva dhamme pañca sahadhammikā

#10# nāma te nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu hirīpi nāma te nāhosi
#11# kusalesu dhammesu ottappaṁpi nāma te nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu
#12# viriyaṁpi nāma te nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu paññāpi nāma te
#13# nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī

#15# pañca sahadhammikā vādānupātā gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgacchanti. Yo hi
#16# koci bhikkhave bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena

#0# Katame pañca saddhāpi nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu hirīpi
#1# nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu ottappaṁpi nāma te ahosi
#2# kusalesu dhammesu viriyaṁpi nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu
#3# paññāpi nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu yo hi koci bhikkhave
#4# bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena assumukhopi
#5# rudamāno paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carati tassa ^a^PA.III,5^ea^ diṭṭheva
#6# dhamme ime pañca sahadhammikā pāsaṁsaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgacchantīti.
#7# [6] Na tāva bhikkhave akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva

#9# saddhā antarahitā hoti assaddhiyaṁ pariyuddhāya { 1 Ma. Yu. pariyuṭṭhāya. sabbattha vāresu īdisameva.} tiṭṭhati atha

#15# dhammesu yato ca kho bhikkhave ottappaṁ antarahitaṁ hoti anottappaṁ

#18# hoti kusalesu dhammesu yato ca kho bhikkhave viriyaṁ antarahitaṁ hoti
#0# Kosajjaṁ pariyuddhāya tiṭṭhati atha akusalassa samāpatti hoti na
#1# tāva bhikkhave akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva paññā paccupaṭṭhitā
#2# hoti kusalesu dhammesu yato ca kho bhikkhave paññā antarahitā
#3# hoti duppaññā pariyuddhāya tiṭṭhati atha akusalassa samāpatti
#4# hotīti.
#5# [7] Yebhuyyena bhikkhave sattā kāmesu laḷitā { 1 Po. caḷitā. Yu. palālitā.} asitabyābhaṅgiṁ

#9# tādisā vā ye ca bhikkhave hīnā kāmā ye ca majjhimā
#10# kāmā ye ca paṇītā kāmā sabbe kāmātveva saṅkhaṁ gacchanti

#0# Vuḍḍho { 1 Po. Ma. Yu. sabbattha vuddho.} hoti alaṁpañño anapekkhā pana { 2 Ma. Yu. dāni.} bhikkhave dhātī tasmiṁ

#19# [205] Pañcime bhikkhave cetokhilā katame pañca idha
#0# Bhikkhave bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati ^a^PA.III,249^ea^ nādhimuccati na sampasīdati { 1 Po. na pasaṁsīdati.}

#4# padhānāya ayaṁ paṭhamo cetokhilo. Puna caparaṁ bhikkhave bhikkhu

#11# [207] Pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṁsā yāguyā katame pañca

#15# [208] Pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā dantakaṭṭhassa akhādane

#0# Mukhaṁ na duggandhaṁ hoti rasaharaṇiyo visujjhanti pittaṁ semhaṁ
#1# bhattaṁ na pariyonaddhati bhattamassa chādeti ime kho bhikkhave

#3# [209] ^a^PA.III,251^ea^ Pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṁ

#14# okkamato. Pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṁsā upaṭṭhitassatissa
#15# sampajānassa niddaṁ okkamato katame pañca sukhaṁ supati sukhaṁ

#0# [213] Pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā
#1# katame pañca idha bhikkhave dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṁ
#2# mahatiṁ bhogajāniṁ nigacchati ayaṁ bhikkhave paṭhamo ādīnavo dussīlassa
#3# sīlavipattiyā. Puna caparaṁ bhikkhave dussīlassa sīlavipannassa pāpako
#4# kittisaddo abbhuggacchati ayaṁ bhikkhave dutiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa
#5# sīlavipattiyā. ^a^PA.III,253^ea^ Puna caparaṁ bhikkhave dussīlo sīlavipanno yaññadeva
#6# parisaṁ upasaṅkamati yadi khattiyaparisaṁ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ

#8# ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā. Puna caparaṁ bhikkhave dussīlo
#9# sīlavipanno sammūḷho kālaṁ karoti ayaṁ bhikkhave catuttho ādīnavo
#10# dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā. Puna caparaṁ bhikkhave dussīlo sīlavipanno kāyassa
#11# bhedā parammaraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati ayaṁ
#12# bhikkhave pañcamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā ime kho bhikkhave
#13# pañca ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā. Pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṁsā
#14# sīlavato sīlasampadāya katame pañca idha bhikkhave sīlavā sīlasampanno
#15# appamādādhikaraṇaṁ mahantaṁ bhogakkhandhaṁ adhigacchati ayaṁ bhikkhave
#16# paṭhamo ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya. Puna caparaṁ bhikkhave sīlavato
#17# sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati ayaṁ bhikkhave
#18# dutiyo ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya. Puna caparaṁ bhikkhave sīlavā
#19# sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati yadi khattiyaparisaṁ yadi
#0# Brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ yadi samaṇaparisaṁ visārado
#1# upasaṅkamati amaṅkubhūto ayaṁ bhikkhave tatiyo ānisaṁso sīlavato

#8# [214] Pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā bahubhāṇismiṁ puggale katame

#0# Pāsādike katame pañca attāpi attānaṁ na upavadati anuvicca

#6# satthu sāsanaṁ na kataṁ { 1 Ma. Yu. akataṁ.} hoti pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjati

#4# Dīghacārikavaggo tatiyo
